Rejuvinatin' June - The New Challenge

  • warning: fopen() [function.fopen]: Filename cannot be empty in /nfs/c04/h01/mnt/66721/domains/themonthlychallenge.com/tags/release-1.1/includes/file.inc on line 757.
  • The file could not be created.
  • warning: fopen() [function.fopen]: Filename cannot be empty in /nfs/c04/h01/mnt/66721/domains/themonthlychallenge.com/tags/release-1.1/includes/file.inc on line 757.
  • The file could not be created.
Sun, 06/15/2008 - 22:00 | by Jesse

So, the only half-marathon I can find anytime soon is the Disneyland half marathon at the end of August. I'm planning on being extremely out of shape by then, so the new challenge for June is going to be to run a ~10 mi. loop by myself. This may be harder since I won't have other runners to push me, or onlookers who I don't want to look lame and tired in front of. I'm currently thinking about a loop between Griffith Park and Glendale.

Man, I hope this isn't as hard as The Runyon Run...
